name: The Last Druid
description:
This game was made for the StraightUpGameJam

It is a tale of the last Druids before they leave for the never realm.

It has a heavy focus of Elemental magic and some surprise items with special mechanisms.

Fight goblin like creatures and face Demi Gods with the goal to restore the Gems to your kinfolk.

Once the Gems are restored you, your people and your love can return to the never realm. Giving up your place on Earth as the New God swaths the land.
